channel.title: In need of a host 24/7, Ill give you co owner
channel.description:
Hey, I need a 24/7 host, Im looking and have been looking forever, I hope I finally find one. Im using many sources but people say I need to start beta now! So Ill be using many sources, But also, It would help If I had a host! NO-IP please?
Thanks,
Ps. If you want to Pm me more then do so. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] The Server Development/Help section is strictly for the server, this means no discussion about the client, trouble with compiling in general, and anything other than the development of servers and otherwise.[/center]

item.title: In need of a host 24/7, Ill give you co owner
item.dc:creator: @eviltwin1 eviltwin1
item.description:
@eviltwin1 wrote:

[quote=“hah bah gee, post:2, topic:194976”]Yea umm first of all you cant offer stuff as a reward, secondly they can take any position they want, they control the files, and all the ownership status’[/quote] lol well its not like they can get any better position then co owner cuz owner and co owner are like the same thing unless u edited a command to only work with a certain username

Read full topic
